item.title: Problem 136 Single Number
item.description: Problem Statement Link - Problem 136 Question Given a non-empty array of integers nums, every element appears twice except for one. Find that single one. You must implement a solution with a linear runtime complexity and use only constant extra space. Note We need O(1) space and O(n) time complexity. That means we cant use any other space to store frequency of elements and cant sort the array and check for the element which is not repeated.
